title: Riding The New Segway miniPRO
description: (   ) --- Today's Mystery Video -   Segway miniPRO -   Music by -   Had a chance to check out the new Segway miniPRO. This thing is like  an advanced version of those hoverboard type vehicles you've seen around. The miniPRO is far more stable and capable of self-balancing. It's also got an app for controlling various functions including the ability to drive it when not onboard. Thanks to Segway for sending this over!  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
